Introduction

POLARIX is a nine-member South Korean-Chinese upcoming boy group under Idol Youth Entertainment. They were formed through IQIYI's survival show Starlight Boys. While their debut is currently unknown, they will debut sometime in 2025. On April 28th the group release the pre-debut single "Dreamless".

Starlight Boys started airing on October 1, 2024, and the final episode was broadcast live on December 28, 2024, announcing the group name to be POLARIX and revealing the nine winners voted by the fans to be, in rank order: Shao Zi Heng, Lee Jun Hyuk, Xu Shi Huan, Xin Che, Pentor, Lee Han Gyul, Zai, Yang Dong Hwa, and Lee Da Eul.

Prior to their participation on the show, Pentor already debuted in the Thai boy group LAZ1, formed throught the survival show LAZ iCON, where he finished in 5th place. Lee Han Gyul was a contestant in KBS2' project show The Unit, where he ended up in 13th place, and MNET' survival show Produce X 101, where he ranked 7th place and debuted with the final group X1. He also debuted as a member of the South Korean duo H&D, and boy groups IM and BAE173. Lee Jun Hyuk was also a contestant in Produce X 101, where he ended up in 75th place, and later debuted as a member of the South Korean boy group MIRAE. Xu Shi Huan participated in MBC' survival show Fan Pick, where he finished in 23rd place. Yang Dong Hwa was a contestant in IST Entertainment' survival show The Origin - A, B, or What?, where he ranked 6th place, securing his spot in the final group ATBO but leaving before their debut. He also debuted as a soloist in February 2024. Lastly, Lee Da Eul competed in MNET' survival show Boys Planet, where he ranked 47th place.
